alert.note: Alert for Arkansas; Bradley; Calhoun; Cleveland; Desha; Drew; Jefferson; Lincoln; Ouachita (Arkansas) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued March 12 at 12:25AM CDT until March 12 at 1:30AM CDT by NWS Little Rock
info.description: The National Weather Service in Little Rock has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... Bradley County in southeastern Arkansas... Eastern Cleveland County in southeastern Arkansas... Desha County in southeastern Arkansas... Calhoun County in southwestern Arkansas... Central Ouachita County in southwestern Arkansas... Drew County in southeastern Arkansas... Southeastern Jefferson County in southeastern Arkansas... Lincoln County in southeastern Arkansas... Southern Arkansas County in southeastern Arkansas... * Until 1230 AM CST. * At 1125 PM CST, severe thunderstorms were located along a line extending from Cottondale to near Star City to near Warren to 6 miles north of Harrell, moving east at 55 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts and quarter size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Hail damage to vehicles is expected. Expect wind damage to roofs, siding, and trees. * Locations impacted include... Pine Bluff... Camden... Monticello... Warren... Dumas... Dermott... Star City... Rosedale... Hampton... Rohwer... Altheimer... Gould... Hermitage... Gillett... Wilmar... Grady... Arkansas City... Mitchellville... Harrell... Tillar... HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...1.00 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.

area.areaDesc: Arkansas; Bradley; Calhoun; Cleveland; Desha; Drew; Jefferson; Lincoln; Ouachita
